EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Your Honeywell order is almost ready to go.
Order Summary: _________________________________________________________
Order placed: {!Case.Order_Placed_Date_Time__c} Purchase Order#: {!Case.Customer_PO_RO_WONumber__c} Sales Order #: {!Case.Order_Entered__c}
But before we can get it out to you, we need help with some missing or outdated information.
Missing Carrier Name/Carrier Account Number Missing Freight Terms Carrier Account Number is not valid
So please reply to this email or call with the following information right away – preferably at least 10 calendar days before the estimated ship date listed below. If we don’t have your information by then, we’ll need to invoice you for any pre-paid transportation charges.
Estimated Ship Date: {!Case.Estimated_Ship_Date__c}
Questions?
We’ll connect all of your order details through the subject line of this email. So please leave the subject line unchanged, when you reply, to make sure your response is routed immediately to this team.
Thanks again, we appreciate your business!
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com 1-800-601-3099 or internationally at 1-602-365-3099
ORIGINAL CORRESPONDENCE: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Description} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
